title: Dress Codes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/19/21
itunes:title: Dress Codes - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 3/19/21
description:
Guest host Ian Punnett and author Richard Thompson Ford explore his research into the rules and implications for clothing and fashion in modern society, how ties and bell bottom jeans change over time and how James Bond and JFK helped kill men's hats.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
